alert.note: Alert for Randolph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Randolph County through 515 PM EDT... At 440 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Winchester, or 16 miles southeast of Muncie, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Winchester around 455 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for east central Indiana.
